item.title: The Path to AGI Architecture
item.description: An AGI architecture for self-improvement based on the three layers of human knowledge: technology, science, and philosophy. Explores metacognition and safety.

item.title: AI Consciousness: We're Arguing About the Wrong Thing
item.description: An exploration of why the debate on whether AI can be 'truly conscious' is less important than preparing for AI that acts indistinguishably from conscious beings.

item.title: Will AI Be Anthropomorphic?
item.description: AI will be born in our image, but it won't stay that way. An exploration of the dual nature of superintelligence.

item.title: State of AI - June 2025
item.description: A summary of the state of AI as of June 2025
